price: E, por sua fala: "Ó Senhor meu!", por certo, estes são um povo que não crê.
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
